subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Basketball (College)
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: This year’s Final Four in Atlanta will probably be the last at the Georgia Dome, the site of exciting regional clashes, a memorable Kentucky-Arkansas title game and even a roof-piercing tornado.
snippet: This year’s Final Four in Atlanta will probably be the last at the Georgia Dome, the site of exciting regional clashes, a memorable Kentucky-Arkansas title game and even a roof-piercing tornado.
